mapper.select: SELECT houseinfo.aptCode AS aptCode, houseinfo.apartmentName AS apartmentName, houseinfo.lat AS lat, houseinfo.lng AS lng, CONCAT(houseinfo.dong, ' ', houseinfo.roadName, ' ', houseinfo.jibun) AS address, COUNT(*) AS totalDealAmount, REPLACE(MAX(housedeal.dealAmount), ',', '') AS maxDealAmount, REPLACE(MIN(housedeal.dealAmount), ',', '') AS minDealAmount, AVG(housedeal.dealAmount) AS avgDealAmount, AVG(housedeal.area) AS avgArea FROM (SELECT * FROM houseinfo sh WHERE sh.dongCode = #{dongCode}) houseinfo JOIN housedeal ON houseinfo.aptCode = housedeal.aptCode WHERE 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{baseLatitude})) * COS(RADIANS(houseinfo.lat)) * COS(RADIANS(houseinfo.lng) - RADIANS(#{baseLongitude})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{baseLatitude})) * SIN(RADIANS(houseinfo.lat)) ) <= #{distance} GROUP BY houseinfo.aptCode
